text: Ultimate Custom Night is a point-and-click survival horror video game created by Scott Cawthon. It is the second official spin-off of the Five Nights at Freddy's game series, the first one being FNaF World, and the eight game overall. The game was released on June 27, 2018 for free on Steam and Game Jolt. == Gameplay == The game allows the player to choose from 50 characters from all of the six main Five Nights at Freddy's games preceding it, as well as from the spin-off, FNaF World, and set their difficulty levels for the night from a minimum of '0' to a maximum of '20'. The player can also choose their office settings, which are all based from the first five games. == Reception == It received good reviews from Rock, Paper, Shotgun. ==References== Category:Five Nights at Freddy's
title: Ultimate Custom Night
